results.title: Israel Might Become a Bitcoin Nation — Here’s What’s Changing
results.description: Israel is steadily moving closer to becoming a Bitcoin-friendly nation. Not through dramatic announcements, but through deliberate regulatory and financial shifts. What many once treated as a speculative fringe technology now commands serious attention from lawmakers, regulators, and financial institutions

results.description: Bitcoin could be poised for fresh all-time highs in 2026, according to BitMEX co-founder Arthur Hayes. results.title: Bitcoin Pauses Below $97K as Momentum Cools
results.description: Bitcoin slowed today after a strong multi-week climb, trading around $96. 6K and printing a small daily pullback on the chart. However, that kind of stall is common when the price reaches the upper edge of a range, and short-term traders rotate risk, especially with BTC still below the psychological $100K level

results.title: Crypto Rally Triggers $718M Short Liquidation Event
results.description: More than $718 million in short positions were wiped out across the crypto market in the past 24 hours. Marking the largest short liquidation event since October’s market crash, according to liquidation and derivatives data. The move coincided with sharp upside momentum in Bitcoin and Ethereum

results.description: Standard Chartered forecasts Ethereum outperformance versus Bitcoin, citing network effects and growing real-world asset adoption.
